summary: The document is a historical record associated with the JFK assassination, specifically a form from the HPSCI (House Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence) bearing the record number 135-10001-10238. It details a telephone conversation with Sturgis on April 22, 1975, found within a file labeled 'STURGIS, FRANK' 'O/R-I (00)', which was sanitized by the CIA. The document is classified as 'U' (Unclassified) with no restrictions, marked 'OPEN IN FULL', and its current status is 'O'. The last review was conducted on September 2, 1994. The document contains handwritten notes that are mostly illegible.
key_findings: Document pertains to the JFK assassination investigation.
References a telephone call with Sturgis on April 22, 1975.
Included in a CIA-sanitized file titled 'STURGIS, FRANK' 'O/R-I (00)'.
The document is unclassified and fully accessible without restrictions.
